name: Cosmic Battle 3000 A.D.
description:
Cosmic Battle 3000 A.D. is a game I created alone during the Curious Game Jam 2020 (https://itch.io/jam/curious-game-jam-2020) , a 48 hour game jam.

It is a shoot'em'up inspired by Space Invaders that plays with the arrows to move and space to shoot. Between each phase, player has the possibility to increase his stat (HP, Shoot's frequency, Speed).

There may be bugs, especially due to responsiveness that may not be effective (some enemies may appear outside of your screen) but I hope my next games won't have those issues !
